about_the_game:
In FSA Driving, you will become a super courier in the fictional city of Nijnait, navigating the streets and alleys in various high-performance vehicles. Make strategic use of the city's terrain and items, showcasing stunt driving skills to complete thrilling delivery challenges and savor a unique driving experience.

Explore a rich and entertaining open world
Embark on a journey through Nijnait, inspired by the city of Tianjin in China. Speed through bustling urban areas and vast wild outskirts, collecting items, engaging in various mini-games, and experiencing interactive elements integrated into the map.

Unique stunt abilities
Beyond regular driving, master challenging maneuvers such as blade overtaking, water gliding, and airborne gliding—actions that are hard to achieve in real life.

Simulated management elements
Conduct goods trading in specialty shops located across different areas of the city. Buy low, sell high, and race against fluctuating price curves.

Character development aspects
Manage resources such as energy, hunger, and restroom needs, as these values will impact your missions. Restore these values by interacting with various buildings on the map. Enhance your abilities gradually by increasing your driving and stunt proficiency throughout the game.

name: FSA DRIVING

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600, Core i5-8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570, GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600, Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX5700 (8GB), GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: An open-world driving game that integrates elements of role-playing and simulation management. Engage in delivery missions, trade runs, and underground races. Customize vehicles, drift, showcase stunt driving, and soar over the skies of Nijnait City. delivering a one-of-a-kind driving experience.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
